Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "Ahem, this is Nanami, I'm nine years old! And today I'll be recording my life with a digital diary!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Nanami is definitely not recording this because it is required homework...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "By recording my daily life, Nanami will get to look back and remember all the good times! That's what the teacher's been telling Nanami!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Ahem, ummm, what should I record today...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Ah, let's begin with Nanami and her family!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Nanami's family has a daddy, a mommy, a Nanami... ah, and Mimi!"}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Mimi's a shepherd dog and loves sleeping beneath the sofa! And head rubs! Every time, Mimi goes awoo when Nanami begins giving scratches."}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "And Nanami's daddy and mommy are the bestest daddy and mommy in the world! They love Nanami the most! Nanami loves them the most too!"}
{2: 'Mother', 3: "Nanami, food's ready! It's your favorite dish. But remember to wash your hands."}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Awoo! Favorite dish! Nanami's coming! Okay, record for today's done!"}
